newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australia names head of petroleum association.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australia names head of petroleum association.

text.p: The Australian Petroleum Production and Exploration Association (APPEA) on Tuesday named Barry Jones as its executive director.
Jones, who takes up his appointment in December, replaces Dick Wells who was head of APPEA from 1991 and left to head the Minerals Council of Australia from November 1.
APPEA's deputy director Peter Cochrane will be acting executive director until December.
Jones has an extensive background in resources and energy policy in the federal public service, including three years as minister for agriculture and energy at the Australian Embassy in Paris.
He is currently the executive director of the Pulp and Paper Manufacturers' Federation of Australia.
